modmenu.descriptionTranslation.net_music: A backpack of records = accidental weight training.
item.net_music_list.name: Playlist [%s songs]
gui.net_music_list.title: Playlist Settings
description.net_music_list.mp3: Provided by N44, models replaced with MP3
command.net_music_list.fail: Import failed, please check your network connection
config.net_music_list.title: Net Music: Playlist Settings
config.net_music_list.hud.title: HUD Position Settings
config.net_music_list.not_pause_sound: Sound does not pause when game is paused
config.net_music_list.not_pause_sound.ti: Allows currently playing sounds to continue when the game is paused
config.net_music_list.max_import_list: Maximum number of songs to import
patchouli.net_music_list.title: Net Music: Playlist Manual
patchouli.net_music_list.description: Net Music: Basic usage guide for playlists
patchouli.net_music_list.play_list.title: Playlist
patchouli.net_music_list.play_list.descr: The core of the entire mod
patchouli.net_music_list.play_list.add_m: Place the playlist item into the record burner/computer. The mod is adapted to allow direct burning.$(br)(If song overwriting occurs, please refer to the next section.)$(br)You can use the list/ prefix to import NetEase Cloud Music playlists.
patchouli.net_music_list.play_list_ui.te: Hold the playlist item and click to open an interface. Click the options in the list to select songs.$(br)If 'Add Song' is selected, the burned song will be appended to the end of the playlist; otherwise, it will overwrite the current song.$(br)In this interface, you can switch playback modes, delete, and move songs.
patchouli.net_music_list.play_list_use.t: Simply insert it into the jukebox. (Note: This is not the vanilla jukebox.)
patchouli.net_music_list.music_player.de: Using the Net Music: Playlist without a portable music player is like using only a PS to key out a green screen.
patchouli.net_music_list.music_player.us: Prepare a record or playlist with content (the playlist cannot be in append mode). Pick it up in your inventory, then left-click on the player to place it for playback. Right-click the player to retrieve the internal record/playlist.$(br)When an item is inside, the player will display the current song information in the item details.
patchouli.net_music_list.music_player.fa: While the portable music player is playing a song, right-click to open the quick song selection menu (on the right side of the screen). Use the scroll wheel to select a song, and use it again to switch songs.$(br)Hold the acceleration key (default: Left Shift) to scroll faster. Hold the translation display key (default: Left Alt) to show the translated song name.$(br2)Songs marked in red are VIP songs and currently cannot be played.
patchouli.net_music_list.music_player.hu: When the portable music player is playing music, it will display song information in the top-left corner, including the song cover, name, translated name, playback progress, and lyrics.
patchouli.net_music_list.ender_player.de: Equivalent to a wirelessly playing jukebox
patchouli.net_music_list.ender_player_us: The usage of the Ender Player is basically the same as the Net Music Player's jukebox.$(br)Right-click to add or remove yourself from the whitelist.$(br)If the whitelist is empty, it will play music to everyone around regardless of distance (but they must be in visible range).$(br)Otherwise, it only plays music to the corresponding players.
